title: Rah Sun - It's Not A Game - 1998 - (MP3 / 256kbps) + Music Video
description:
Straight from Strong Island, Rah Sun debuts with IT'S NOT A GAME, where the eighteen-year-old MC offers striking, intelligent rhymes detailing true-life experiences. Rah Sun urges his listeners to check the depth of his lyrics. Focused on bringing a change to the world of hip-hop, Sun exclaims, "I'm gonna make a change for real. Most people don't take this rap thing seriously." As for the tracks, check out the club-bounce of "Shorty," the title track" and the mid-tempo jeep-buster "What?" In addition, Big Punisher drops skills on the single "I'll Be Around," which uses a catchy Tom Waits sample. Despite his youth, Rah Sun emits a lyrical explosion on IT'S NOT A GAME that will make you snap to and pay attention. 

Artist: Rah Sun
Album: It's Not A Game
Original Release Date: October 20, 1998
Label: Sony 550 Music
Produced By: Far East Flavor
Billboard Ranking: #30 on Hot Rap Singles for I'll Be Around (1998)
Format / Bitrate: MP3 / 256kbps
Source / Running Time: Audio CD / 48:02
YouTube Link: youtube . com / user / bangcityny / videos
Facebook Link: facebook . com / rahbcg
Comments / Notes:

	This is a very rare CD to get ahold of.  It contains one of the rarest Big Punisher features. We have included copies of the music videos for the singles in the best quality we could find.  If you are a fan of 90's New York rap then this CD will feel like home.  You should also check out all the newest music by visiting the YouTube and Facebook links as well.  Feel free to contact Rah Sun via Facebook for bookings, shows, verses, etc.
